pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Python implementation of the geodesic routines in GeographicLibThis is a library to solve geodesic problems on an ellipsoid model ofthe earth.Licensed under the MIT/X11 License; see[LICENSE.txt](https://geographiclib.sourceforge.io/LICENSE.txt).The algorithms are documented in* C. F. F. Karney, [Algorithms for geodesics](https://doi.org/10.1007/s00190-012-0578-z), J. Geodesy **87**(1), 43â€“55 (2013); [Addenda](https://geographiclib.sourceforge.io/geod-addenda.html).The documentation for this package is inhttps://geographiclib.sourceforge.io/Python/doc
